divs: Sighting Detailsi was taking my dog out to do her thing in the front yard at around 10:00 to 10:30 p.m.,,i caught somthing shinny out the corner of my eye, at first i thought it might be the headlamps of a jet liner, but it was'nt,it was a bright light, glowing, with no pulsating or flashing lights with it, this was a clear night and you can see the air liners real good with their strobing lights, it moved very silently and at a very fast pace, if i had to guess at speed from where i was standing, it went straight over my house at about 2 to 3 hundred m.p.h., i watched it go from n. to s. untill it looked a star , then i went back into the house. the odd thing is when i took my dog out the next night, i seen the same light, moving w. to e. at same rate of speed. the only thing about it was a made a criss-cross right over my house. it seemed like it was mapping. my wife and has witnessed some u.f.o. together also. i would really like to talk to someone about them. most of them has happened around where we live. thank you for your time.
Summary: ball of light moving at a steady rapid pace from n. to s., then from west to eastwas
